column4: please, any simple way how to convert flv or mp4 youtube-downloaded videos into MP3 with custom (possibly high) bitrate?
i have tried elltube, which is actually sweet and hilarious, but it converts into 64KiB/s MP3s...
and the most widespread videoDownloadHelper doesn't work for me
look in your tmp: folder every youtube  video  goes there copy it elsewhere and name something useful
